name: Pungoland!
overview: Implementation of a Sega game, transporting eggs with a penguin. You can move the eggs and try to get the eggs out of the bottom of the screen. If the egg falls too low, it breaks. If you get caught by a monster, you're dead, and if a monster catches the egg, so is you. The whole thing is quite tricky. I don't even remember how I made it through all the levels...
